mapper.select: select nickname, location, create_date, comment_content, recommend_count from comment where board_idx = #{boardIdx} order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment (board_idx, nickname, comment_content, create_date, location) values(#{boardIdx}, #{nickname}, #{commentContent}, now(), #{location})
mapper.update: update comment set recommend_count = recommend_count +1 where comment_idx = #{commentIdx};
